function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exploration of untested technologies for pandemic control","Impact":"Potential for ineffective or harmful interventions","Mitigation":"Thorough testing and validation of technologies before widespread implementation","Technologies":"Digital tools and emerging technologies","People":"Society, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Research community and regulatory authorities"},{"Description":"Failure to address immediate problems during COVID-19 crisis","Impact":"Increased spread of the virus, greater strain on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Rapid deployment of effective technologies, proactive planning and response","Technologies":"Digital tools and emerging technologies","People":"Society, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Research community and healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of focus on safe living environments post-COVID-19","Impact":"Risk of future outbreaks and continued vulnerability to infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Integration of technologies for safe living environments, public health initiatives, and education","Technologies":"Digital tools, environmental sensors, public health infrastructure","People":"Society, urban planners, public health officials","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations"}]}
